00017 #ifndef BOOST_MPL_AUX_CONFIG_COMPILER_HPP_INCLUDED
00018 #define BOOST_MPL_AUX_CONFIG_COMPILER_HPP_INCLUDED
00019 
00020 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/config/dtp.hpp"
00021 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/config/ttp.hpp"
00022 #include "boost/config.hpp"
00023 
00024 #if defined(BOOST_MSVC) && BOOST_MSVC < 1300
00025 #   define BOOST_MPL_COMPILER_DIR msvc60
00026 
00027 #elif defined(BOOST_MSVC) && BOOST_MSVC == 1300
00028 #   define BOOST_MPL_COMPILER_DIR msvc70
00029 
00030 #elif defined(__GNUC__) && !defined(__EDG_VERSION__)
00031 #   define BOOST_MPL_COMPILER_DIR gcc
00032 
00033 #elif defined(__BORLANDC__) 
00034 #   if !defined(BOOST_NO_DEFAULT_TEMPLATE_PARAMETERS_IN_NESTED_TEMPLATES)
00035 #       define BOOST_MPL_COMPILER_DIR bcc551
00036 #   else
00037 #       define BOOST_MPL_COMPILER_DIR bcc
00038 #   endif
00039 
00040 #elif defined(__MWERKS__) 
00041 #   if defined(BOOST_BROKEN_DEFAULT_TEMPLATE_PARAMETERS_IN_NESTED_TEMPLATES)
00042 #       define BOOST_MPL_COMPILER_DIR mwcw
00043 #   else
00044 #       define BOOST_MPL_COMPILER_DIR plain
00045 #   endif
00046 
00047 #elif defined(BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION)
00048 #   define BOOST_MPL_COMPILER_DIR no_ctps
00049 
00050 #elif defined(BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_TEMPLATE_PARAMETERS)
00051 #   define BOOST_MPL_COMPILER_DIR no_ttp
00052 
00053 #else
00054 #   define BOOST_MPL_COMPILER_DIR plain
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 #endif // BOOST_MPL_AUX_CONFIG_COMPILER_HPP_INCLUDED
